text: Hodgkin is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Alan Lloyd Hodgkin (1914–1998), British physiologist and biophysicist * Dorothy Hodgkin (1910–1994), British chemist who received the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 1964 * Douglas Hodgkin, American political scientist and author * Eliot Hodgkin (1905–1987), British painter * Howard Hodgkin (1932-2017), British painter * Thomas Hodgkin (1798–1866), English pathologist, eponym of Hodgkin's disease * Thomas Hodgkin (historian) (1831–1913), British historian * Thomas Lionel Hodgkin (1910–1982), English historian ==See also== * Hodgkins (disambiguation) * Hodgkin lymphoma, also known as Hodgkin's lymphoma and Hodgkin's disease
title: Hodgkin
